Title: TheOliver.Controls
Description: A collection of easy to use controls in blend for Designer: Coverflow, FishEye and ImageGrids.
HomeWiki:
The Project "TheOliver.Controls" is a library of controls for Silverlight 3 and 4 build on Visual Studio 2010.
All controls are visible a design-time in Blend and Visual Studio.

It currently contains the following controls:
- An easy to use Analog Clock
- A nice Clip Clap Control (see Image)
- A memory control, to check the the memory usage at runtime

Planned controls
- Coverflow
- tbd.





You can see the controls in action here: http://os75.com/controls/samples.html
